## Set up

You will need to create a directory called `sdm-lab` in your home directory, which is called `home/jovyan`.

![Create a sdm-labs folder if you have not already](images/r-home-folders.png){width="189"}

Create an RStudio project at the sdm-labs directory.

File > New Project > Existing directory
